title: Corsairs Gold (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_corsairs_gold_2.1.0.7.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: CORSAIRS GOLD
Genre: Strategy - Real-time - Historical
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10)
Languages: Audio and text: Deutsch, English, espaÃ±ol, franÃ§ais, italiano, nederlands, polski, portuguÃªs
Modes: Single-player
Released: April 30, 1999
Size: 324 MB
Company: Microids / Anuman Interactive
Rating:	ESRB Rating: Everyone (with Animated Violence)
Store page: http://www.gog.com/game/corsairs_gold

About:
Plunge into a world of adventure and freedom and discover the excitement of sailing, the thirst for gold, thundering cannons, and savage pirate attacks.
A fascinating quest will drive you to the four corners of the Earth and new adventures will await you in each port along your journey. You will accumulate fortune for yourself and for your country, either by force or through your shrewd business dealings.
As an accomplished warrior and a skillful negotiator, only strategy will serve to forge your reputation. You may even succeed in becoming more admired than the king and more feared than the most barbaric of pirates!
Includes Corsairs: Conquest at Sea, and its expansion Corsairs: The New Conquerors.
Command every aspect of your fleet, from your crew's morale to the sale of your cargo.
Sail authentically reproduced vessels using historically accurate maps.
Meet famous characters such as Blackbeard, Surcouf, and Rackham the Red, and take part in major battles based on real events.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10, 1.8 GHz Processor, 512MB RAM (1 GB recommended), 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 (compatible with DirectX 9 recommended), 2GB HDD, Mouse, Keyboard
